pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:5.1: 90. The training rule on getting nuns to massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:6.2: At that time the nuns were getting other nuns to massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:6.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:6.4: “How can nuns get other nuns to massage and rub them? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.3: “How can nuns get other nuns to massage and rub them?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.7: How can nuns get other nuns to massage and rub them?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:8.1: ‘If a nun gets another nun to massage her or to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:10.4: if she gets massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:10.6: if she gets rubbed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:11.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:12.1: The seventh training rule is finished.
